info.description: A modular SaaS backend API built with Go and Gin framework. Features a plugin-based architecture with four core modules: Base (authentication, users, tenants, contacts, newsletter), Customer (plans, customer management), Email (SMTP services, notifications), and PDF (document generation). Supports dependency injection, event-driven communication, and automatic module discovery.
info.title: Unburdy Server API

get.description: Retrieve complete audit trail for a specific entity (e.g., all changes to an invoice)
get.summary: Get audit logs for a specific entity

get.description: Export audit logs in CSV format for tax authority compliance (GoBD). Supports same filtering options as GET /audit/logs.
Retrieve audit logs with optional filtering by user, entity, action, and date range. Supports pagination.

Retrieve aggregated statistics for audit logs (action counts, user activity, entity type distribution). Returns statistics including total logs, action counts, user activity, and entity type distribution.

200.description: Audit statistics with action_counts, user_activity, entity_type_counts, total_logs, date_range

get.description: Retrieve all invoices for the authenticated user with pagination and all associations preloaded

post.description: Create a new invoice with invoice items for specified sessions

parameters.description: Invoice information with client ID and session IDs
parameters.name: invoice

post.description: Adapts session data and creates an invoice in the invoice module

get.description: Retrieve all clients that have sessions not yet associated with any invoice
Retrieve a specific invoice by ID with all associations preloaded

put.description: Update an invoice's status or invoice items (not both at once)

delete.description: Delete an invoice and all its invoice items by ID

parameters.description: Number of clients per page (respects DEFAULT_PAGE_LIMIT and MAX_PAGE_LIMIT env vars)

post.description: Create a new draft invoice with sessions, extra efforts, and/or custom line items. Items are reserved with status 'invoice-draft'.

200.description: List of VAT categories with code, description, rate, is_exempt fields

put.description: Edit a draft invoice by adding/removing items and recalculating totals

post.description: Create a credit note for an existing invoice with selected line items
Finalize a draft invoice by generating invoice number and changing status to 'sent'
Mark an invoice as overdue if payment is past due date
Mark an invoice as paid with optional payment date and reference
Send a payment reminder email for an overdue invoice
Send an invoice to the client via email

get.description: Generate and download XRechnung-compliant UBL XML for a finalized invoice to a government customer
Retrieve all sessions with pagination

post.description: Create a new therapy/appointment session linked to a calendar entry

Create a recurring calendar series (if interval_type is provided) or a single calendar entry and corresponding sessions for a client. For single entries, omit interval_type or set it to "none". For recurring series, provide interval_type (weekly/monthly-date/monthly-day/yearly), interval_value, and last_date.

Create sessions for a client using a booking token. This endpoint does NOT require authentication - the token itself is the authorization. The token contains client_id, calendar_id, tenant_id, and user_id.

get.description: Retrieve a session associated with a specific calendar entry
get.summary: Get session by calendar entry ID

get.description: Retrieve all sessions scheduled for 7 days starting from the specified date (or current date if not specified) with detailed client information including their previous and next sessions
get.summary: Get detailed sessions for upcoming 7 days

parameters.description: Start date (YYYY-MM-DD format, e.g., 2025-12-23). Defaults to current date if not provided.
parameters.name: date
